title: 100% proof that mass reporting gets you punished
body:
I was playing a normal game with 4 premade people. They were being toxic all game to the point of where they literally told me to die at the end. Now mind you I was NOT being toxic to them and I have the logs to prove it. This single game of me being reported by all 4 of them at the end resulted in me getting a 25 game chat restriction.

Game 1
In-Game
M1stry: cho can i get a leash plz
M1stry: no leash no gank
M1stry: you pushed into their tower what u want me to do carry ur casket?
M1stry: not afk
M1stry: ur just not getting a gank because u didnt leash
M1stry: i warned u
M1stry: nah thats ok
M1stry: u said im afk
M1stry: i cant help u if u dont know how to play
M1stry: yup
M1stry: nope thats ur job
M1stry: kewl then ull get banned
M1stry: not trolling cho is just being none stop toxic and wants to cry in chat
M1stry: everyone on this team is your friend
M1stry: thats because all uve seen is iron
M1stry: i think they come from iron and the iron mentality is "if i die it must be the jg fault"
M1stry: sorry bannedguy what were you saying? i couldnt hear u over the multiple banned accounts u have for being toxic

replies.body: You had a negative attitude (one of the report options) throughout the entire game.  This is 100% proof of nothing.  You were toxic by negative attitude and thus you got punished.  It has nothing to do with 1 or 4 reports.

First even if that were true having a negative attitude has never been as is still not grounds for a punishment. Second toxicity is NOT having a negative attitude, toxicity is willfully tilting your team, flaming, cursing, inting. Doing things that intentionally make your team lose the game. I did none of those things, while they did most if not all of them. And yet I'm the one who got punished. Why? Because I wasn't in a 4 man premade when I reported them.

You're the one who got punished because you exhibited negative attitude aplenty that game.  Just because you think it's not ground for punishment doesn't mean it's true.  It is one of the report category.  Even if only 1 person reported you that game would result in the same punishment.  Also, please tell me how you would know for a fact you got reported by all 4 of them?
Wrong, I got punished because all 4 of them reported me, and I know that for a fact because all 4 of them were trolling none stop and they were all in the same premade clan.

That is not 100% proof that all of them reported you and since that is the premise of your entire post, your 100% proof is not really 100% is it?  If there exists a possibility that not all of them reported you, then you cannot have 100% of shit.

Cursing, by itself, has no effect on punishments. It's all in how the language is used.

But, look at your chat like this: Was any of it useful in helping your team win the game?
Asking for reports is considered toxic behavior, and a **lot** of what you said ranges from simply negative to outright toxic.
Where do you see me asking for reports? And by the way not 1 thing I said is considered outright toxic, unless you have no concept of what being toxic actually is.

>M1stry: kewl then ull get banned
> M1stry: sorry bannedguy what were you saying? i couldnt hear u over the multiple banned accounts u have for being toxic

Implied asking for bans.

>M1stry: you pushed into their tower what u want me to do carry ur casket?
M1stry: ur just not getting a gank because u didnt leash

Uncooperative and somewhat toxic.

>M1stry: i cant help u if u dont know how to play

This is literally toxic.

>M1stry: thats because all uve seen is iron
M1stry: i think they come from iron and the iron mentality is "if i die it must be the jg fault"

Again, more toxicity.

Not a single thing you said there is toxic and ill break it down 1 by 1.

1) M1stry: kewl then ull get banned
M1stry: sorry bannedguy what were you saying? i couldnt hear u over the multiple banned accounts u have for being toxic

Bannedbuy is his username, with something else at the end. I was literally using his name. His teammate was trolling and said he would int and I told him if he did he would get banned. Neither one of those things is toxic both are true.

2) M1stry: you pushed into their tower what u want me to do carry ur casket?
M1stry: ur just not getting a gank because u didnt leash

They wanted me to gank for them while they were literally sitting under the enemy tower, so I told them that a gank like that would only help if they wanted me to carry their casket back. I asked the top to leash for me, he flat out said no when i told him he wouldnt get ganks if he didnt gank he laughed. Not toxic at all, it's 100% on him.

3) M1stry: i cant help u if u dont know how to play

That guy went 1/9 and tried to blame me for him inting all game, and i told that sentence, because it's literally the reason he's been feeding. No one can help someone who doesn't know how to play. Nothing toxic about it.

4)M1stry: thats because all uve seen is iron
M1stry: i think they come from iron and the iron mentality is "if i die it must be the jg fault"

the 1/9 guy says "ive never seen such a bad jg in my life" so i told him  "thats because all uve seen is iron".
The second line was me talking to the enemy team who agreed with me about them being iron and having an iron mentality. Neither one of those is even remotely toxic.

Just because you don't think it's toxic doesn't automatically make it not toxic. 

It's Riot's  standards, not yours.

Just because they think it's toxic doesn't automatically mean it is. They're a game company that literally just got sued for having a hostile toxic workplace environment. And they're really going to tell someone what toxicity is? REALLY?

It automatically means it is toxic in their product. If you don't like the fact it is considered toxic, then you don't have to use their product. 

Oh look, they are dealing with the consequences of those actions. Doesn't mean you get a free pass though.
Yea you're right, silly me. Getting flamed none stop by an entire team of scumbags then getting punished for being flamed by an entire team of scumbags is 100% sensible. What was I thinking?

You weren't punished for them being toxic.

You were punished for being toxic yourself.

Don't like something someone is saying? Mute them. That simple.

Nope, try again. I didn't get punished for being toxic, I got punished for being mass reported. And no matter how many times you claim that's not the case I have multiple instances that prove different. 

This game has become a toxic wasteland of garbage trolls that go around in groups and try to find new and creative ways to get solo players banned.

And obviously we should take the word of a disgruntled player who can't accept responsibility for their behavior; over what was officially stated on how 1 report does the same as 9. 

Especially since it is far easier to code

>if report >0 then review game for category.

As opposed to something like.

>if 1 report then review
If 2 reports then super review
If 3 reports then super duper review
If 4 reports then ultimate review.
Etc etc.

Reports only mark games for review. If you don't do anything wrong, then no punishment.

just because they got sued for sexism doesnt mean suddenly they cant say your behavior is toxic anymore.

you went into their house and agreed to their rules. if you break the rules, they have every right to warn you.
and eventually kick you out (ban you) if you dont listen to their warnings.

idk if you want any advice but here is one: stop putting yourself above everyone else.

> [{quoted}](name=M1stry,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xRKITA1X,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-27T07:55:12.812+0000)
>
> Not a single thing you said there is toxic and ill break it down 1 by 1.
> 
> 1) M1stry: kewl then ull get banned
> M1stry: sorry bannedguy what were you saying? i couldnt hear u over the multiple banned accounts u have for being toxic
> 
> Bannedbuy is his username, with something else at the end. I was literally using his name. His teammate was trolling and said he would int and I told him if he did he would get banned. Neither one of those things is toxic both are true.

>[It does check out - his name *is* bannedguywhippin](https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/match/na/3277926441#participant1). The bot likely wouldn't detect that, but that's a valid point.

> 2) M1stry: you pushed into their tower what u want me to do carry ur casket?
> M1stry: ur just not getting a gank because u didnt leash
> 
> They wanted me to gank for them while they were literally sitting under the enemy tower, so I told them that a gank like that would only help if they wanted me to carry their casket back. I asked the top to leash for me, he flat out said no when i told him he wouldnt get ganks if he didnt gank he laughed. Not toxic at all, it's 100% on him.

While that's highly suspect and I'm certainly not reading anything like that from this (which means the bot probably didn't either) we'll let it pass for now because I don't want to argue on that.

> 3) M1stry: i cant help u if u dont know how to play
> 
> [Several excuses]

It doesn't matter how good or bad they're doing. "You do not know how to play the game" is literally toxic, and there's no fucking reason to say it in-game.

> 4)M1stry: thats because all uve seen is iron
> M1stry: i think they come from iron and the iron mentality is "if i die it must be the jg fault"
> 
> the 1/9 guy says "ive never seen such a bad jg in my life" so i told him  "thats because all uve seen is iron".
> The second line was me talking to the enemy team who agreed with me about them being iron and having an iron mentality. Neither one of those is even remotely toxic.

Not only does that literally make no sense ("You've never seen anything worse than me because you're in the worst elo"), is fundamentally untrue (He's Bronze 4), **and** is hyprocritical as shit (You're unranked with an average enemy rank of Iron 2), it's still - guess what? That's right! It's still toxic!

Things can be both toxic and true. There are better ways to say things, and, to paraphrase an old saying: "Don't fucking say it unless it's either kind or absolutely necessary".

You flaming them was not necessary.

What you just said to me would be considered 100x more toxic than ANYTHING I've said to them. And what's even more sad is that you literally accused me of flaming a team that none stop flamed me all game. I really REALLY hope you get this team once, and I hope after they mass report you and get you punished you remember this conversation and realize just how sad it is that you're insisting I'm the toxic one.

>What you just said to me would be considered 100x more toxic than ANYTHING I've said to them.

The closest thing I came to toxic was pointing out the irony in an unranked player calling a bronze 4 hardstuck iron.

> And what's even more sad is that you literally accused me of flaming a team that none stop flamed me all game. 

What they do, unless it literally and directly forces you into an action, is irrelevant. **Them** flaming **you** is not considered something that forces you into an action.

Something that *would* be considered forced action would be them literally holding a gun (or other weapon) to you or a loved one and making you say toxic things. While I suppose I have no actual proof this did not happen, you didn't bring it up and it's **incredibly** unlikely for dozens of reasons. Another forced action would be DDoSing you to make you AFK, or W>Ring you as Tahm Kench to make you die in their fountain. They could also theoretically use some sort of remote desktop and take control of your computer and type that, maybe...?

None of these happened, though (you'd at least have mentioned it if it did), so you're responsible for what you said.

>I really REALLY hope you get this team once, and I hope after they mass report you and get you punished you remember this conversation and realize just how sad it is that you're insisting I'm the toxic one.

I'm reasonable certain I've **been** 4-man reported before. Fuck all came from it.

The entirety of my punishments are a warning from back when Riot still warned you if you got reported, and a warning not to go AFK again when I had to leave for emergency reasons (and still caught the remake window, hopefully). That's it.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xRKITA1X,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-27T07:33:09.846+0000)
>
> Asking for reports is considered toxic behavior, and a **lot** of what you said ranges from simply negative to outright toxic.

wait hold up.. Telling people to report is considered toxic? if someone drops the N word, you go into all chat and say "the guy is racist please report", you are the villain?

It's considered harassment.

You aren't the villain because it's not that cut and dry, and you (generally) won't be punished if the *only* toxic thing you do is ask for reports. However, it *can* be the tipping point to be considered *just* toxic enough to get a punishment, and it's pointless anyways.

Despite OP's objectively false claims, multiple reports for a single game mean literally nothing, with the only possible exception I'm aware of being if there's different categories selected between reports (I don't have any actual confirmation of that, but I assume it's the case otherwise report categories would be pointless). Reports only flag the game (or, in the case of reporting for their name, the name) for review. A second identical report doesn't flag it twice. The code only checks for >0 reports, not how many reports.

tl;dr: It's minor harassment and is entirely pointless.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Azir Africa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xRKITA1X,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2020-01-29T18:20:42.054+0000)
>
> wait hold up.. Telling people to report is considered toxic? if someone drops the N word, you go into all chat and say "the guy is racist please report", you are the villain?

Its not so black and white. Breaking the rules doesnt make you a villain... the world isnt that simple. Yes calling for reports is considered toxic. When would you ever need someone else to report, when you could just do it yourself? Its an attempt to single someone out and get people in the game to single that person out. What if you did nothing wrong, but every game is filled with people telling everyone to report you? League would kinda suck after a while, wouldn't it? So its against the rules. Remember, 1 report has the same effect as 9. There is never a reason to ask for others to report for you. And there are no stipulations in the rules that allow you to break the rules (like if they said the N word, now youre allowed to ask for reports... thats not the case. You need to start reporting on your own, not asking others to report). Its sad tthat Riot does such a poor job of explaining this shit to players. Seems like so many people are ignorant of how the system works.

> This single game of me being reported by all 4 of them

You don't know that.

>resulted in me getting a 25 game chat restriction.

Which need not be the result of the fact that you got reported by all 4 of them.

Basically, your 100% proof starts right off the bat with an unproven assumption, and then follows up with the classic post hoc ergo propter hoc fallacy (X happened after Y, therefore X was the result of Y).
Your "proof" - despite being impressively short - contains two major flaws.

And while certainly more mild than most logs I see on this subforum you **were** antagonizing and taunting them. If this is the way you behave frequently, I'd say a chat restriction is perfectly fair.

You threatened to afk numerous times, looks like you're crying in all chat, and you're being extremely passive aggresive. Deserved ban, do you ereally thionk we're this stupid or are you just that dillusional?
Meanwhile here i am with my 2k reports and im still not even a chat restricted : [
You're level 76, you don't even have 2k games.
On my account in EuNe , this account is from like few months lol i dont know how many reports i have on this one , have to check xD
If your account was reported even once by multiple people in any game I promise you would instantly be punished for it.

For what i will get punished? This is not how the system works. Riot explained it.
If you dont break the rules you wont get punished thats it.
You was toxic that why you got punished , stop blaming something else for your own mistakes.
They lied, I didn't break the rules and still got punished, their system is a 100% lie.
You was toxic towards your team thats why you got punished.

Wrong, my team was toxic towards me, I wasn't toxic. And anyone who looks at that chat and concludes that THAT is what toxicity looks like has no business being in any competitive game ever, especially this one.

Doesnt matter if your team is toxic to you that doeant give you an excuse to be toxic to them. You kept insulting your team, you got puniahed. Thats it deal with your ego now and go ahead. Dont be toxic in the future.

>my team was toxic towards me

These are not mutually exclusive, and you were *very* much toxic.
I not sure you know what 100% means, or proof.

> [{quoted}](name=M1stry,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xRKITA1X,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-01-27T07:31:22.820+0000)
>
> I was playing a normal game with 4 premade people. They were being toxic all game to the point of where they literally told me to die at the end. Now mind you I was NOT being toxic to them and I have the logs to prove it. This single game of me being reported by all 4 of them at the end resulted in me getting a 25 game chat restriction.
> 
> Game 1
> In-Game
> M1stry: cho can i get a leash plz
> M1stry: no leash no gank
> M1stry: you pushed into their tower what u want me to do carry ur casket?
> M1stry: not afk
> M1stry: ur just not getting a gank because u didnt leash
> M1stry: i warned u
> M1stry: nah thats ok
> M1stry: u said im afk
> M1stry: i cant help u if u dont know how to play
> M1stry: yup
> M1stry: nope thats ur job
> M1stry: kewl then ull get banned
> M1stry: not trolling cho is just being none stop toxic and wants to cry in chat
> M1stry: everyone on this team is your friend
> M1stry: thats because all uve seen is iron
> M1stry: i think they come from iron and the iron mentality is "if i die it must be the jg fault"
> M1stry: sorry bannedguy what were you saying? i couldnt hear u over the multiple banned accounts u have for being toxic

You don't have to convince anyone OP. Everyone will believe what they want to believe. And trust me, it doesn't matter whether you can convince anyone here or not because no one here holds the power to revert your punishment. 

Back on topic. The problem here isn't that you got to their desk for a manual review because of multiple reports in a particular match. The problem here is that anything innately close to being 'Negative' behavior can get you punished and that you did have stuff in your logs which they could label as being 'Negative'. 

Riot's policy is just how it is. Next time, mute and report. If you can't deal with it and feel like you're about to pop a vein without flaming or arguing back, just get off the game and take a break. Less of a punishment for that as opposed to saying something to a premade and then getting punished for it like this! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 

And you should be even more careful now because the next one would be a 2-week suspension. Be cautious! Don't even try to argue anymore. I'd suggest simply muting everyone once you get into the game and then doing whatever you need to do. 

Good luck! {{sticker:galio-happy}}
The comments about iron mentality etc are disrespectful.

This is your second punishment, and you still think your behavior is perfect even when told precisely what's wrong with it. Either take responsibility for your own actions or you'll eventually get a permaban.

My behavior is perfect for a human being. There is no responsibility to be taken, this system was set to snowflake level, and now anything you say will get you punished. But don't worry you'll get punished too, I guarantee it, everyone single person will. Because they expect for people to never get mad, or be completely mute, neither will happen in this game. So keep thinking you're "good". It'll be all the more funny when you get banned for it.

> [{quoted}](name=M1stry,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xRKITA1X,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2020-01-27T08:00:02.020+0000)
>
> My behavior is perfect for a human being. There is no responsibility to be taken, this system was set to snowflake level, and now anything you say will get you punished. But don't worry you'll get punished too, I guarantee it, everyone single person will. Because they expect for people to never get mad, or be completely mute, neither will happen in this game. So keep thinking you're "good". It'll be all the more funny when you get banned for it.

I've been playing since 2011 and - like most players - have never been punished. You, on the other hand, have just gotten your second punishment and you're not even level 30 yet. If you don't behave according to these "snowflake level" rules, whether you like them or not, you'll eventually be permabanned.
You have? Is that why there's no record of you in any season before this one and you're only level 88? Kid buzz off, I don't have time for trolls who can't even properly troll.

> [{quoted}](name=M1stry,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xRKITA1X,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-27T08:13:04.672+0000)
>
> You have? Is that why there's no record of you in any season before this one and you're only level 88? Kid buzz off, I don't have time for trolls who can't even properly troll.

I don't suppose a new player would get the reference, but this account has a novelty name. I have several such accounts. If you're looking in my match history and you can't see any record that I've played before S10, try scrolling down. I'm not sure how I would even get to 88 without having played in any prior season when it only started less than a month ago.

Even with my gameplay fragmented across multiple accounts, this one has gotten to 88 while yours has accrued two punishments by 28.

For the last time, either change your behavior or you'll eventually be one of the tiny fraction of a percent of the playerbase that manages to get permabanned. It's up to you. I don't have anymore time to waste on this conversation, so I bid you goodbye.

Just to tell you since i see you are new player . Back in the days we had a level cap of 30. That was for such a long time. My main is only level 118 and im having it since season 1 so its perfectly normal for him to be low level and playing from season 1. I as him , have few accounts so im not playing only on my main. Stop judging people by their level , nobody insulted you for your level.

Edit: meant to post it to m1stry lol , my phone is crazy xD
Is that suppose to be impressive? I'm level 28 in under a month of play. 88 is a supreme yawn.

> [{quoted}](name=M1stry,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xRKITA1X,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-27T14:42:16.825+0000)
>
> Is that suppose to be impressive? I'm level 28 in under a month of play. 88 is a supreme yawn.

Yes, having two punishments in your first month of play is very impressive. The way you're going, you'll lose this account in another month or two.
Is this the ONLY game on your report card?
Yup the only one. Which I found amazingly strange because usually there's like 3 games and it gives you the blow by blow, here this is the only game.

Unlike the whitenkights here, MANY of us believe you are not wrong at all.

Riot is much more interested in banning players 

riot says that 1x or 4x or 9x doesn't matter, but it does. I've seen multiple times where someone was only "somewhat" negative like above and get instant feedback simply because we all agreed to report them.

I've also seen homophobic and racially motivated slurs go unpunished because only one person reports.



The fact is, riot cant say "Your 1x report matters just as much" and "if your reports are flagged as false, they have less of an effect" at the same time. It simply doesn't make sense AT ALL.

The fact is, riot doesn't care about actually carrying out a good system - they only care about appearing that a system helps people make their feelers feel better - it gives a tool to toxic kids to report players, and doesn't punish real toxicity - like trolling and soft inting.

The truth is, the system is broke but they don't want to spend money on human review, so they just role with it and flash ESPORTS everywhere and damn any sense of negativity in the public eye.
